Title: Trezor Model T
Description: The Trezor Model T is an advanced cryptocurrency hardware wallet. Store Bitcoin, passwords, tokens and other keys with confidence. Invented for your digital independence.

Title: Trezor Model One
Description: The Trezor Model One is the most secure hardware wallet choice for everyone, whether you're new to Bitcoin or already an expert.

Title: Trezor Model One(white)
Description: The Trezor Model One is the most secure hardware wallet choice for everyone, whether you're new to Bitcoin or already an expert.

Title: Extended USB-C cable
Description: Extra long Type-A to Type-C cable for convenient connection of Trezor to a computer. 1.8 m. 70.8 inch.

Title: Cryptosteel Cassette
Description: The Cryptosteel Cassette is designed to securely store recovery seeds and other alphanumeric data up to 96 characters long. It's the perfect pocket-sized stainless steel offline backup tool.

Title: Silicone case for Trezor Model T
Description: Personalize and protect your Trezor Model T hardware wallet with this stylish black silicone case cover.

Title: InCharge Ultra Portable Cable USB-C
Description: Small, tangle-free charging/sync cable. Measures only 1.5 inches/3,8 cm and snaps onto your keyring with a strong magnet. Take it with you and connect your Trezor anywhere.

Title: Premium Adjustable Trezor Lanyard
Description: Hang on to your bitcoin wallet wherever you go, with this premium adjustable Traffic Green lanyard for the Trezor Model One hardware wallet and Trezor Model T silicone case.

Title: Ledger Nano X
Description: The next level hardware wallet. Buy & Securely manage your crypto in one single-app, anywhere you go. Become the only one in charge of your assets.

Title: Ledger Nano S
Description: The original hardware wallet. Easily start your crypto journey: buy crypto, secure your assets and manage them in one single-app.

Title: Ledger OTG Kit
Description: All the cables and adapters you need to connect your hardware wallet to your Android phone or laptop.
